detectors.description:
CocoaToken.claim() (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#108-137) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- percentage = (user_available_balance * 1e6) / _tokens_total (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#116)
	- userRewardShare = (_rewards_total * percentage) / 1e6 (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#117)
detectors.markdown:
[CocoaToken.claim()](f/cocoa_smart_contracts/contracts/CocoaToken.sol#L108-L137) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [percentage = (user_available_balance * 1e6) / _tokens_total](f/cocoa_smart_contracts/contracts/CocoaToken.sol#L116)
	- [userRewardShare = (_rewards_total * percentage) / 1e6](f/cocoa_smart_contracts/contracts/CocoaToken.sol#L117)

detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract CocoaToken (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#16-184) has payable functions:
	 - CocoaToken.receive() (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#171-173)
	 - CocoaToken.fallback() (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#177-179)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description: CocoaToken.claim() (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#108-137) ignores return value by usd_token.approve(address(this),userRewardShare) (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#132)
CocoaToken.claim() (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#108-137) ignores return value by usd_token.approve(address(this),0) (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#131)

CocoaToken.constructor(address,uint256,string,string).name (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#47) shadows:

	- IERC20Metadata.name() (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol#15) (function)

CocoaToken.depositFunds(uint256) (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#151-159) should emit an event for: 
	- _rewards_total = amount (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#158)

CocoaToken.setUsdcContract(address).usdc (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#40) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _usdc_address = usdc (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#41)

CocoaToken.setUsdtContract(address).usdt (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#32) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _usdt_address = usdt (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#33)

Reentrancy in CocoaToken.claim() (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#108-137):
	External calls:
	- usd_token.approve(address(this),0) (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#131)
	- usd_token.approve(address(this),userRewardShare) (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#132)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _burn(address(this),user_available_balance) (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#135)
		- _balances[from] = fromBalance - value (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#194)
		- _balances[to] += value (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#206)
	- _burn(address(this),user_available_balance) (contracts/CocoaToken.sol#135)
		- _totalSupply += value (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#186)
		- _totalSupply -= value (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#201)
